name: Megastein
description:
Inspired by Shin Megami Tensei and Wolfenstein.

Plot

Your goal is finding the wizard.

Play

Control using direction keys.

↑/↓: go forward/backward

←/→: turn left/right

Please wait the page fully loaded to play.

The start of BGM is the sign of ready.

Used
  • Cool Cat Game Studio's Free Creepy Music
  • Riciery Leal's VCR OSD Mono
  • Sound of Text's Enlish sound
  • SubPixel Studios's Scifi Pixel Texture Pack
  • Warren Clark's wizard sprite

I can't make this without their assets, thank them!
